Why would I do that? Seems like you and Shadow Weaver have it handled.
{sighs} After everything she's done to us, you're really going to follow her?
I don't like it either, but this is the only plan we have. The Failsafe could finally save Etheria.
Shadow Weaver hurt us. I haven't forgotten that. But Prime is hurting so many more people. I need to stop him, Catra.
I know, I know. You have to go save the world. Spare me the speech.
Hey, she can't do anything to us anymore. Please, come. We--I could really use your help.
Fine. But I'm only doing this to make sure Shadow Weaver doesn't try anything. Not because I like you.
{purrs}
{yelps}
Bow! I need to talk to you!
{yelps}

I was finally able to remove Spinnerella's chip, but it was a lot more difficult than removing Catra's. The chip had almost entirely fused to her nervous system. If we'd waited any longer, I'm not sure we would've been able to get it off at all. The chip would've become a part of her.
That means we're running out of time to save everyone else.

Yes. Luckily, I've got an idea. This is the network that connects all the chips to Prime's hivemind. If I can just figure out how to crack his signal pattern, I could disrupt it, severing his connection to the chips and taking them all offline at once!
That's amazing! We could free everyone on Etheria! You're a genius, Entrapta. Just keep working on it until you get it. We'll be back later tonight.
You got it!
{gasps}
{gasps}
No sorcerers here. Looks like we're--
Keep your voice down.
Don't touch me! {gasps}
For the Honor of Grayskull! {gasps, then yelps}
We have to hurry!
Hmm.
Uh, hey there, where're you going?
I'm so close to cracking Prime's signal pattern! But Spinnerella's chip's not enough. I need to find a place with a high concentration of clones so I can analyze their connection to the hivemind!
Whoa. Wait, wait, wait. You're just gonna walk into a place that's crawling with clones?
Yep!
Ugh, there's no way I'm going to stop you from doing this, is there?
Nope!
Oh, this is a terrible idea. Hop on. I can get you there faster, and get you out if there's trouble.
Works for me! Thanks, Bird Horse!
For the last time, I'm not--Just get this over with.
We're here. Follow my lead.
Would a "please" kill you?
Whoa.
Hey, are you--?
I'm fine.
Catra, it'll be okay. Trust me.
There's no time to waste. News of our presence will have reached the others by now after that...disturbance.
Come on. We have to keep moving.
What is all of this?

We're on the right path. The Crystal of Arxia was rumored to be the key to reaching deep magic within Etheria. Many have tried, and failed, to find it. But those who hungered for more power have long sought other ways to obtain the deep magic...with disastrous results.
The Spell of Obtainment was a mistake, one for which I've paid the price. I don't see why you keep bringing it up.
You roped my brother into your twisted dark magic when he was only a child. You could've killed him.
It would've worked had he not broken the connection. Micah was an exceptional sorcerer, even then. It's a shame it didn't run in the family.
What is going on over there?
The patern is incredibly complex. I need more connections.
No way! Whatever's going on here, it's not good. No tech is worth you getting captured by Prime!
This isn't about tech. It's about our chipped friends. If I can get this to work, I can save them.
{groans} Oh, okay, but be quick. I'll cover you from behind. Please be careful.
Yes! I've got it!
Ahh.
Uh-oh.
Wait!
{gasps}
Adora!
I'm okay. I'm okay.
Did you just jump into fire for me?
What? No!
{laughing}
Shut up!
You did.
It's an illusion!
Some of the fire is illusory, and some is real. Everyone, be careful.
I see you and Catra are close again.
Do you really think that's wise?
It's none of your business.
But it is. If your emotions are blocking you from becoming She-Ra, it's all of Etheria's business. How long has it been since you were able to transform?
It's been happening ever since the Fright Zone. What if...? What if I'm losing her?

She-Ra is a being of pure magic. To unleash her full strength, you must be focused, clearheaded. But you are letting your emotions pull you in too many directions. Catra, she distracts you, confuses you. Haven't you hurt each other enough? If you care about her, focus on protecting her. The world needs you as She-Ra right now, not Adora. And if She-Ra can't stop Prime, then we are all doomed.
I will stop Prime. No matter what.
{growls} Who are you? What are you doing here?
Why do I know your face?
Hordak?
No, do not say that name to me. I have no name.
What have you done to me?
You do remember me. I knew you would.
{neighs} Get away from her! Entrapta, let's go!
Go. Maybe then these memories, these imperfections, will leave me.
Remember! Your imperfections are beautiful!
{gasps}
Whoa.
That is the Failsafe?
It's bigger than I thought it'd be. How are we gonna get that to the Heart?
The Failsafe is a code. It's stored inside of the Crystal.
So, what do we--?
It needs a password.
I think you already know what it is.
We're friends of Mara.
What does it say?
"Someone needs to go inside and accept the Failsafe"? What does that mean?
It means the Failsafe must be bonded to a willing soul and carried to the Heart of Etheria in their body in order to be deployed.
And we're sure that's safe?
We can't turn back now. The Failsafe is within our grasp.
Adora, don't go in there.
Catra, this is not the time. Someone must take the Failsafe.

So, you do it, then. I've been watching you the whole way in. You've been in here before, haven't you? You could've taken the Failsafe yourself and gotten all the power you've ever wanted. But you didn't. Why?
You're being paranoid. This is the only way to stop Prime. Adora understands that well enough.
Why does it have to be Adora? What is going to happen to her? What aren't you telling us?
Answer the question.
{growling}
Whoever uses the Failsafe must absorb the full magic of the Heart when it is destroyed. That much raw magical power would burn any mere mortal apart. None of us are strong enough.
But She-Ra is.
Only She-Ra can hope to survive the process. No one else can do it.
And if I don't survive it?
Then the magic will be restored to Etheria through your sacrifice. You will give us the power to bring us victory. Prime will be defeated. Your friends will be free.
You were planning this all along!
Why are you surprised by this?
It's not going to work!
There is no way we're risking Adora like that!
Stop it!
I'll do it.
No. What? What's wrong with you? Shadow Weaver is sacrificing you. Why can't you see that?
Because even if she is, it's better than Prime getting the Heart and destroying the universe! We're out of options. This is the only way.
Well, look who it is.
Adora!
Whoa!
Dad!
Hello, daughter. I'm so pleased to see you.
{gasps}
And you, sister.
Her, not so much.
Glimmer!
For the Honor of Grayskull! No.
We have to get out of here!
The Failsafe! We can't!
Adora, no! Please. It doesn't always have to be you!
Adora! {yells}
{yelling}
Ahh.
What's happening?
{laughs}
Is that--?
Dark magic. After all, I learned from the best.
{gasps} Micah, no!
{yelling} {gasps}
{groans}
For the Honor of Grayskull!
{yells}
I've got it. I've got the Failsafe. Let's get out of here.
{grunting}
{mewing}
Catra.
{mewing}
Catra?
Catra, stop!
You were just gonna leave?
I'm doing you a favor. I'm a distraction, right? Now you can go save the world without having to worry about me confusing you.
No, that's not true. Don't listen to Shadow Weaver. This isn't about her.
Why? Why are you like this? Why do you always have to sacrifice everything for everyone else? When do you get to choose?
What do you want, Adora?
I...I have to do this, Catra. I'm the only one who can.
Then do it. That's what you want. That's what you'll always choose. I don't have to stay and watch it happen.
Catra, please, stay. I need you.
No, you don't. You never have.
Catra!
Adora, you made the right choice. Don't let Catra convince you otherwise. She's never understood.
Stop! I will never forgive you. You ruin people. You ruin any chance they could ever be happy. Haven't you done enough?
I did what I had to do.

Keep telling yourself that. I'm going to take the Failsafe to the Heart, and I'm going to save Etheria. But I am not doing it for you. I'll do everything I can to make sure you never get your hands on the magic.
{winces} {gasps}
These flowers really bring out the color in your eyes.
Bow, could you stop playing that thing?
Hey, I'm still learning.
Well, I like it.
Hey...

Prime is getting closer every day to figuring out how to access the Heart of Etheria. If he succeeds, he can use it to destroy worlds, galaxies, maybe even the entire universe. The Failsafe is our only chance at stopping him. But Prime still has our friends. His hold over them grows stronger every day they're chipped. If we don't free them now, we might lose them forever. Prime holds every advantage in this fight. He'll be ready for us. But we have a plan. Entrapta?

I finally succeeded in cracking Prime's signal pattern. If I get access to his Spire network, I can use it to broadcast a jamming frequency that will disable all of the chips on Etheria, freeing everyone at once!

I need you all to get Entrapta to the Spire and keep Prime's forces distracted while she jams the signal. I'm gonna take the Failsafe to the Heart and destroy it, once and for all. We're going to make sure that Prime can never hurt anyone ever again. We're ending this today. For good.
Yeah!
Oh.
You weren't trying to sneak out without us, were you?
Any sign of Catra?
She's not coming back. Are you sure you guys should come? We don't know what to expect from the Heart of Etheria. It could be dangerous for you.
There's no way we're letting you do this on your own. Whatever we find, we fix this together.
For the honor of Grayskull!
Warning. Planetary facilitator Light Hope protocol offline. Manual administrator access not recommended at this time.
We're friends of Mara. Now show us where the Heart of Etheria is.
Welcome, friends of Mara.
{grunts}
{yells} Ow! What's wrong with you?!
{mews}
Stop it! Stop it! I told you, I'm not going back.
{growling}
{grunting} You saw what happened! Adora chose Shadow Weaver, okay? Not me! Adora doesn't want me! Not like I want her.
Hey, bot-faces! Come and get us!
{chuckles} Plenty for both of us.
Brothers. It is I, a faithful acolyte of Horde Prime, just like you.
{whinnies}
Nice work, Wrong Hordak.
{chukcles} Oh! This is so exciting!
Perforation!
We have to keep their attention on us until Entrapta can finish.
{yelps}
{gasps} Wow.
Okay, Entrapta, you got this. You got this.
Are you scared?
No. I just really hope this works.
It's okay, Adora. We'll be with you the whole way. When we get back, it'll be a whole new world.
Did you guys hear that?
What?
Catra?
Hey, Adora.
Catra, you came--
Adora!
You're going the wrong way. The trail is back there. You okay?
We need to be careful. It looks like this place can still project memories. We can't let it distract us.
What?
{winces}
My brothers. The time has come at last. No longer shall She-Ra stand in my way. The Heart shall be laid bare, its power mine for the taking.
Cast out the shadows. Bring the universe to Prime's light. Cast out the shadows. Bring the universe to Prime's light. Cast out the shadows. Bring the universe to Prime's light.
Begin the acquisition process.
{gasps}
Adora. We have to warn Adora!
Adora?
Adora!
{gasps}
Adora!
Adora, are you okay?
What's going on?
I think I know. This place is responding to my memories. I think I'm doing this.
So, why here? And how do we get out?
When I broke the Sword, I thought...I thought I could make my own destiny. But I can't. It was always going to end like this.
What do you mean, "end"? Adora!
I'm losing her. I'm distracted and confused, and I'm scared. And I can't be any of those things if this is going to work.
I need to go the rest of the way by myself.
Adora, no! You don't have to do this!
I love you guys so much. I never could have done any of this without you. Thank you for being the best friends anyone could ask for.
Adora!
{panting} Adora! Adora!
She's not here.
What do you mean, she's not here? Where is she?
She's gone to the Heart of Etheria to free the magic and become the hero she was born to be. If you are still so selfish as to try and stop--
Enough! This isn't about you and your messed-up power trip anymore. Prime is doing something to the planet. He's infecting it. He's going for the Heart.
The last of Etheria's security protocols have been breached, Lord Prime. Planetary acquisition is at 20 percent.
{laughing maniaclly}
Oh...Almost. {yelps}
Welcome, little rebel. You're just in time to witness the end of your world.
Why aren't they shooting?
Oh, no.
Rejoice, Etheria, for your day of reckoning has come. I offered you mercy. But you have spurned my good graces. So be it.
{screams}
Entrapta!
I'm sorry.
Your resistance has been for naught. Your She-Ra has abandoned you. All that is left for your world is a terrible and eternal night.
Take us to Adora. Now!
She's too far away by now. We'd never reach her in time.
No. Use your magic. I know you have more power than you're letting on.
It doesn't work that way, Catra!
You've done it before! When you abandoned me in the Fright Zone. And you've always been able to track us our whole lives. So, do something good with it and help me save Adora before it's too late!
Come here.
Adora! Adora!
{groans}
Catra?
Where's Adora?
She...She left us. She's headed to the Heart on her own.
Of course she's gone! That's what she does, isn't it?
Catra, what is going on?
Horde Prime is onto you. He's hacking into the planet. All of this is from him.
He's gonna take the Heart.
That's not all. He's got Entrapta.
If Prime has Entrapta, that means the other princesses are still chipped. We have to get back up there.
We can't just leave Adora!
I'll stay. I'll find her.
Catra...
I can't lose her again, okay? I promised her a long time ago that I'd look out for her. It's time I made good on that.
Take care of her, Horde scum.
That's the plan, Sparkles. And good luck.
The four of us don't need luck. We're the Best Friend Squad.
{meows}
Get them there safe, okay?
{meows}
Go help the Princesses! I'll handle the signal. {grunts}
Bow...I love you. I love you.
I love you, too.
Be careful, okay?
Me? I'm always careful.
{whistles}
I'm going to save Etheria, no matter what it takes. Your sacrifice won't be in vain. I promise.
But at what cost? I never wanted to die. I sacrificed myself so you would never have to. Why are you doing this, Adora?
It's better this way. My friends will be safe. They'll be happy.
And you? What do you want when this is all over?
I...It doesn't matter. I'm She-Ra. This is what I'm supposed to do.
You're worth more than what you can give to other people. You deserve love, too. You're so close, Adora. Don't give up yet.
Mara? What's--?
Ah. Adora. So, this is where you've run to hide.
There's too many! We have to retreat!
Retreat where? We're totally surrounded.
{yells}
{scoffs}
{laughing} Yeah!
Miss me?
Yes, but also, behind you!
Mermista. Horde Prime thinks he controls you. But I know you. And I'm gonna prove it to you with the power of shanty! Oh--Whoa! Downward!
{yelling} You know, this is actually kind of nice. Doesn't it remind you of the first time we met? You also tried to kill me then. {yelping}
{chuckles} {yelping}
{groans, then gasps} Couldn't wait to sweep me off my feet?
{growls} Why are you like this?
Because I love you, dearest. And also, it's a good distraction.
Please forgive me for that when you're back to normal.
Uh, guys? Did anyone see where Scorpia went?
I'm gonna help Bow with the signal. Aunt Casta, can you--? {gasps}
Hello, baby girl.
You're not here. You can't stop me.
How strange. I must have fought her, must have known her face. But I have no memory of it.
I've seen so many like her over the years. One by one, all their faces have been lost to oblivion. Just as yours will be.
{yelps}
{screaming}

A parting gift from the First Ones. Their old security system. Capable of taking out even one as strong as She-Ra. You will never make it to the Heart, Adora. Your own people made sure of that. Goodbye, my oldest enemy.
[Wincing]
[shrieking]
[Growls, then grunts, attacking the Creature] [Yells] Hey, Adora.
Catra! You can't be here. It's too dangerous. Shadow Weaver?
Get Adora to the Heart. I'll take care of this thing. [Attacks the Creature]
Catra, no!
I'll catch up, ok? Get to the Heart.
No, no. Catra!
Dad. no!
What's wrong, baby girl? I've never felt better. [Attacks Glimmer]
[screams]
[yells] Scorpia, please! We're trying to save you.
Dad, please! It's me, it's Glimmer!
Oh, I know who you are. My daughter. The weakling. The failure. And so it ends. Pathetic. Alone. Weak.
Mom. [looks to Micah] No. I'm not.
[Yelling]
My mother raised me to be brave. My friends taught me to be kind. And I'm stubborn. I get that from you. I will never stop fighting! And I won't lose another parent!
[Gasping]
I love you, Dad. [Grunts]
[screaming]
[sighs]
[giggle of relief] I've got it! [Gasp]
[Fires electricity at Bow]
Scorpia, it's okay.
Prime may have made you do a lot of things,but he can't turn you into something you're not. So, right now, all I need you to do is trust me.
[Eyes flash back to normal] [Screams]
[Presses button to send confirmation]
[Groaning]
[falls to ground, chip falls out of her neck and turns off. She looks up to Bow and hugs him]
[Grunts]
Oh, my gosh, I am so sorry. [Cradles Bow and puts him down] Did I hurt you? I did not mean to do that.
Welcome back. [Hugs Scorpia]
[Meows]
[Grunts]
[Laughs] My device worked! I knew it would.
[Growls] Deploy all clone battalions. Get this under control!

Hey, everyone. I'm Bow. [Bows hologram appears outside, broadcasting his message to all of Etheria] Prime is probably trying to get his channel back. I have to make this quick. [Camera moves, pans over to Lonnie, Kyle, Rogelio, and Hordak's Imp] Prime's controlled the universe for a long time. [Camera moves back to Bow] Right now,we're the only thing standing in the way of him controlling it forever. [Camera moves to George and Lance] You might be feeling hopeless. You might be thinking "We don't stand a chance." And maybe we don't. [Camera moves back to Bow] Prime's too strong. [Camera moves to Glimmer, she turns around to see a Horde clone battalion appearing] His army is too powerful. But that's not gonna stop us. We need to show Prime we're not afraid of him, because we have each other. [Camera moves to Spinnerella and Netossa, they look at each other lovingly] And we have love. [Camera moves to Castaspella, holding unconscious Micah] We can't give up. And if we go down, we go down together. [Camera moves to Bow] We need you. All of you. [Camera moves to Glimmer and The Rebellion] It's time to take back our world. It's time to fight. For She-Ra, for our homes, for each other!
Put an end to this mockery. [He looks back to his clones with rage] Destroy them all!
[Attacks the Creature, yells]
[Shrieks]
[Chuckles, his hologram appears in front of Catra] Oh, little sister. What a shame. I had such high hopes for you.
[screams]
No. No, wait!
Don't lose your focus. We're so close.
[Groans, clutches the Failsafe in pain]
[Gasping]
[Screams in the distance]
Catra! [She breaks out of Shadow Weaver's grasp and starts running back towards Catra]
Adora, wait! [She looks back to the Heart]
[hologram] So brave, risking yourself for Adora. But it will make no difference. The Heart is almost mine, and when it is, your Adora will die.
So, tell me,little sister, was it worth it?
Shadow Weaver?
Take Adora and run! [She attacks the creature with magic]
What are you...?
I told you to run! Now, run! [She casts magic, blasting Catra back towards the entryway. She casts magic, making a barrier between the room and the corridor]
[bangs on barrier with fists] Shadow Weaver, no! What are you doing?
Please, Catra. You need to make sure Adora reaches the Heart. The magic must be set free. [Her hold on the Creature breaks, and the Creature shrieks. Shadow Weaver groans]
Stop it! It's going to kill you!
It's too late for me. But you, this is only the beginning for you. I am so proud of you, Catra.
[Crying] No! No!
[Grabs Catra's hand] Catra?
You're welcome. [She turns back to the creature and self destructs into a fiery explosion, engulfing the room and the Creature.]
Come on. We have to go.
Yeah!
Impossible.
You can't control us. You don't understand what makes us strong. And that's why you'll never win.
[Grunts]

The Heart of Etheria. We made it. [Catra and Adora let go of each other and look at each other, Adora walks towards the Heart and tried to transform, but she can't. She screams and falls backwards into Catra's arms.]
What is it? What's wrong?
I don't... I don't know. I can't transform. [The room rumbles and begins to turn green with Horde Prime's virus] It's Prime's virus. It's keeping me from becoming She-Ra.
What does that mean? Is the Failsafe not going to work without her?
[The Failsafe glows] No. It'll work. [She looks up at the Heart] Get as far away from here as you can. I have to do this next part on my own.
Adora, what is going to happen to you?

Without She-Ra, the magic will destroy me. I'm sorry, Catra. I'm so sorry. [She begins crying] But there's no more time. It has to end here. I can still save everybody. [She walks forward and grabs Catra's head] It's okay. I'm ready.
No.
Catra...
No. I'm not leaving. Whatever happens, I am staying with you.
Adora?
No, no, no, no, no. No! No! [She looks up to see the environment getting more infected with Horde Prime's virus. A bolt of green light come down and strikes the Heart.]
Ah. I can feel it. The Heart is mine!
You can't do this! The Heart's power is too unstable! It will take you and the whole universe with it!

I have had enough of this chatty little rebel. Dispose of her now. My dominion was perfect. Everything was as it should be. [Hordak looks at Entrapta with hurt in his eyes, powering up his gun, Entrapta looks back at him with disbelief] Everything was as it should be. And so it shall be again. [Entrapta makes a noise of hurt and closes her eyes, she tears up.] Did you not hear me, little brother? Do it now.

I am not your brother. You made me in your image, but I am more than that. [He walks up and grabs Horde Prime by the neck, dangling him off of the edge] I gave myself a name, I made a life of my own. I made... [He looks at Entrapta and she smiles] a friend. I am Hordak, and, I defy your will. [He drops Horde Prime over the edge, Horde Prime screams]
[squeals] You did it! I knew you could-- [She gasps]
[Taking over Hordak's body] Ah, little brother. So it's true. [Pushes hair back] You have been thoroughly corrupted. So be it.
No!

[He grabs Entrapta's hair] You have forced my hand. [He holds her in the hair by her twin tails] I will unleash The Heart, and so we shall die in cleansing flame together! [He snaps and they disappear from the room]
Whoo! [She chuckles]
Glimmer!
Bow!

Rejoice, Etheria, for your end has finally come! You have chosen darkness, [The camera moves to show all of the rebellion fighters grasping onto each other with fear. The camera moves again to show the ground splitting apart] and so, into darkness you shall be plunged. [The sickening green of Horde Prime's virus comes bursting out of the ground] The world shall end in fire.
Adora!
The Failsafe. It didn't work.
And when the ashes scatter, at last, there will be, peace!
Adora. Adora, stay awake!
I'm sorry.
Adora! Adora! [Catra hugs Adora]
Just let me brush it!
No!
[Laughs]
Don't let her touch me. She's gonna torture me.
Do you always have to be this dramatic?
Come on guys. If we are late to Scorpia's first ball she is going to kill us. [He puts his hand around Glimmer's shoulder and she leans into him]
Fine! You're off the hook. This time.
You coming?
A beautiful wish. But there will be no future. [The once beautiful room gets infected with the sickening green of Horde Prime's virus] Not for you.
Adora! [Adora opens her eyes. Catra is leaning into the mysterious green room through a brightly lit opening in the ceiling. She is crying] Please! You have to wake up!
You can't give up. You have never given up on anything in your life. Not even on me.

So don't you dare start now! [She grasps at Adora. Adora's green restraints shatter and she struggles as she reaches back towards Catra, their hands trying to meet one another, but just barely missing.]
It's too late. I've failed.
No! No!
I've got you. I'm not letting go.
[Desperately] Don't you get it? I love you. I always have. So please, just this once. Stay! [Catra and Adora finally intertwine hands.]
Stay.
[leans forward and looks at Catra] You... love me?
You're such an idiot. [She shakes her head. She looks at Adora with surprise. Adora is looking at her with a fond smile on her face]
I love you too.

Cry, Etheria! Cry for Prime's mercy! [The camera moves to look at Bow and Glimmer, cowering and holding onto each other, and then it moves to see the ground crumbling.] There will be no comfort for you! All the universe will be consumed in undying flame!
[Grunts, and then growls, he lets go of Entrapta's twin tails, and all of his clones look up with wonder and confusion.]
Though all is reduced to rubble, Prime shall rise again. So it has been, and so it always shall be.

No. You're wrong. It's time for you to go. [She grabs his face and looks deep into his eyes. She closes her eyes and a bright yellow light engulfs them She opens her eyes again and they are glowing, Horde Prime's soul erupts from Hordak's body and pops like a balloon.]
I remember you. [She-Ra helps him stand up. Entrapta looks up and gets very excited.]
Hordak! [She hugs him and they spin around in circles from the force] I'm so glad you're back! Oh, we have so much to talk about!
Glimmer?
Hi, Dad.
I... You... Hello. I'm your dad!
Dad.
Perfuma! Hi. Wow you look... you look great. [She turns around to see a regretful Catra approaching her and she sets Frosta down.]
Hey, Scorpia. Look, I...[Catra is engulfed in a signature Scorpia hug.] Ooh, there it is!
You know I'm a hugger.
Princess hug! [She hugs Scorpia's back, and Frosta hugs Catra's. They all laugh.]
I'm so glad you're here! Oh...
So are we all just, like, okay with this?
Look at us now. From capturing you to us now being buddies.
We did it!
This is so dope!
Ah. You'd be proud, Mara dearie.
Adora? [Adora looks back to her and extends her hand. Catra grasps it and walks closer. They touch foreheads, Catra is purring.]
It's over. He's gone.
Good riddance.
So, what are we going to do now?
We can bring magic back to the universe. What do you guys say to one more Best Friends Squad road trip? [They all stand up and hug.]
I'm in!
Obviously!
Of course I'm going with you, dummy.
Then let's do this. Together.
